code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/joshuacolvin/Desktop/Development/meal-db/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{GET_RANDOM_MEAL,GET_CATEGORIES,GET_INGREDIENTS,GET_AREAS}from'../actions.jsx';export var getMealsReducer=function getMealsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_RANDOM_MEAL:return[action.payload["meal"]];case GET_INGREDIENTS:return _toConsumableArray(action.payload["ingredients"]);case GET_CATEGORIES:return _toConsumableArray(action.payload["categories"]);case GET_AREAS:return _toConsumableArray(action.payload["areas"]);default:return state;}};
